questions: How does ThamesThrive support customer engagement?
What elements of marketing automation does ThamesThrive have?
What type of customer interaction is ThamesThrive intended for?
answer:
# What is ThamesThrive
ThamesThrive is ann open-source system that supports customer engagement and enhances the consumer experience. ThamesThrive is
not a marketing automation system, although it does have some elements of marketing automation [^1]. ThamesThrive is
intended for anyone who carries out some type of customer interaction, be it through sales or service delivery.
